roleset.name: Claim, seize, appropriate (to) without right

role.descr: Benefactive, whom is arg1 appropriated to?

roleset.note: Roleset based on parallel expansion to PropBank, VerbNet, and sense groupings. Framed by Claire.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: [The Home Secretary]-1 proposes *PRO*-1 to arrogate such powers to himself.

example.name: Non-reflexive benefactive
example.text: They arrogated subsoil rights to many of the remaining areas of land suited for rice cultivation.
example.arg: to many of the remaining areas of land suited for rice cultivation
